api_list.name: get individual spoon blog sites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com/news/{blogid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all spoon blogs
api_list.description: This will get all spoon blogs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
